message:
Do you plan on seeing a movie this weekend, if so, which one? 

I will try to see the same and follow-up with a Dramatica discussion of it.
I'm going to try to watch The Wedding Banquet this week. Not the same thing, but we could discuss and then listen to the podcast.
Cool, works for me. I've moved The Wedding Banquet to the top of my Netflix que and will receive it on Wednesday.
